required.name: Albania
required.note: Visa required, except for A max stay of 90 days for holders of a valid multiple entry visa issued by the USA, UK or a valid multiple entry C visa issued by a Schengen Member

required.name: Andorra
required.note: Andorra has no visa regime, but is only accessible through France and Spain. Multiple Entry Schengen Visa required.

required.name: Argentina
required.note: Visa is free of cost at Argentinian consulate for tourists

required.name: Armenia
required.note: eVisa not available but invitation not required

required.name: Austria
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Azerbaijan
required.note: Azerbaijan has simplified its Visa process.55 authorized travel agents are authorized too issue evisas for Tourists, but it is mandatory to issue hotel booking with them, and some may insist on any other tour as well

required.name: The Bahamas
required.note: Visa not required if holding permanent resident card of the US or Canada

required.name: Bangladesh
required.note: Visa is free of cost at Bangladeshi consulate

required.name: Belgium
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Belize
required.note: No visa required for holders of multiple entry US Visa or Green Card. Indian nationals are required to pay a repatriation fee of BZD1,200 (USD600).

required.name: Bosnia and Herzegovina
required.note:
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 7 days for:
holders of a valid visa issued by EU or a Schengen Member State

required.name: Bulgaria
required.note: Visa required, except for Passengers with a C visa issued by Croatia, Cyprus, Romania or a Schengen Member State

required.name: Canada
required.note: Visa not required if holding a US permanent resident card; After Mar 15 2016, travelers with a US permanent resident card arriving by air will require an Electronic Travel Authorization (ETA). Land and sea arrivals will not be affected.

required.name: Colombia
required.note: Visa required, except for Nationals of India holding a valid "C" or "D" visa issued by a Schengen Member State or holding a valid visa issued by the USA (except for C1 transit visas).

required.name: Costa Rica
required.note:
Visa required, except for A max. stay of 30 days for:
holders of a valid visa issued by Canada, Japan, USA, EU or a Schengen Member State

required.name: Croatia
required.note:
Aliens who are holders of:
uniform visa (C) for two or multiple entries, valid for all Schengen Area Member States; visa with limited territorial validity (LTV visa), for two or multiple entries, issued to the holder of a travel document that is not recognised by one or more, but not all of the Schengen Area Member States, and which is valid for the territory of the Member States recognising the travel document; long-stay visa (D) for stays exceeding three months, issued by one of the Schengen Area Member State;

required.name: Cuba
required.note: The visitors can obtain a Tourist Card (Tarjeta deTurista), which is valid for 30 days and can be extended for another 30 days after arrival. Visitors who booked a package through an airline/travel agency usually receive the card on the plane before landing. The visitors can also buy a Tourist Card upon arrival at the José Martí International Airport in Havana. Non-tourist visitors need visa in advance for a stay of any duration.

required.name: Cyprus
required.note: Visa required, except for Passengers with a double or multiple entry C visa issued by Bulgaria, Croatia, Romania or a Schengen Member State

required.name: Czech Republic
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Denmark
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Dominican Republic
required.note: Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for holders of a valid visa issued by Canada, USA or any EU Member State

required.name: Estonia
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Finland
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: France
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Germany
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Greece
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Guatemala
required.note: Visa not required for holders of a valid visa issued by Canada, the USA or a Schengen Member State.

required.name: Honduras
required.note: Visa required, except for Holders of a valid visa issued by Canada, the USA or a Schengen Member State

required.name: Hungary
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Iceland
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Iran
required.note:
Tourist Visas can be arranged by Tour operators who specialize in the region or Letter of Invitation from Recognized travel agent in Iran
Normally passports submitted at Iranian Consulate are scanned for terrorist links which takes 2 days and if cleared the process and necessary documentation would be advised and process would commence

required.name: Republic of Ireland
required.note: Visa waiver for UK 'C' visa holders until October 2016. Entry permitted only if first point of entry to the Common Travel Area is in the UK.

required.name: Israel
required.note:
Can be arranged from Tour operators or from Consulate.
Recommended to request for a Paper Visa rather than a stamp in the passport

required.name: Italy
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: South Korea
required.note: Visa not required for a stay of max. 30 days provided holding visa for Australia, Canada, Japan, New Zealand or U.S.A. and in transit to/from those countries.

required.name: Latvia
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Lebanon
required.note: In addition to a visa, an approval should be obtained from the Immigration department of the General Directorate for General Security (La Surete Generale).

required.name: Liechtenstein
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Lithuania
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Luxembourg
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Republic of Macedonia
required.note: Any foreign national possessing a valid multi entry Schengen visa type C (valid for the entire territory of the Schengen area) or permanent resident card from Schengen zone countries may enter and stay in the Republic of Macedonia up to 15 days without having to possess a Macedonian visa. The Schengen visa needs to be valid at least 5 days longer than the stay in the Republic of Macedonia permitted on the grounds of holding a Schengen visa., Visa required for holders of temporary residence permits from Schengen area countries.

required.name: Malta
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Mexico
required.note: Visa not required for any valid USA visa (e.g. H, L, F, J, B1/B2 etc.) holders to enter Mexico with tourist, transit & business purposes. Legal Permanent Residents of USA, Canada, Japan, United Kingdom & Schengen States do not require visa to enter Mexico with tourist, transit & business purposes.

required.name: Montenegro
required.note: Visa free for a maximum stay of 30 days for valid visa holders and residents of the European Union member states and the United States.

required.name: Mozambique
required.note: Visa on arrival is no longer available to citizens of countries that host an embassy of Mozambique.

required.name: Netherlands
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: New Zealand
required.note: Indian citizens who are also permanent Australian residents may travel and work in New Zealand

required.name: Nicaragua
required.note: Stay of 90 days (Fee: USD 20) applicable to holders of a valid visa issued by Canada, the USA or a Schengen Member State

required.name: Norway
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Oman
required.note: Indians holding GCC Visa of certain categories (managers, sales executives etc.) are granted a visit Visa on Arrival if they are coming directly from a GCC Country

required.name: Panama
required.note: Visa requirement waived for holders of a valid visa issued by USA, UK, Canada, Australia or any EU member state, which has been used at least once to enter those countries.

required.name: Philippines
required.note: Holders of either a valid US, Japanese, Australian, Canadian, Schengen, Singapore or UK visa or permanent resident permit may be granted visa-free entry for an initial stay not exceeding fourteen (14) days

required.name: Poland
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Portugal
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Qatar
required.note: Single Entry eVisas can be arranged by Tour operators/agents for approx INR 7000

required.name: Romania
required.note: Visa required, except for A max. stay of 90 days for holders of a double or multiple entry C visa issued by a Schengen Member State valid for the period of intended stay.

required.name: Serbia
required.note: Visa free for a maximum stay of 90 days for valid visa holders and residents of the European Union member states and the United States.

required.name: Singapore
required.note: May obtain online.

required.name: Slovakia
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Slovenia
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Spain
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Sweden
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Switzerland
required.note: Schengen Visa required

required.name: Tunisia
required.note: Not required for tours organised by a travel agency.

required.name: Turkey
required.note: Visa on arrival is phased out and e-visa needs to be applied at evisa.gov.tr. Valid Schengen visa / USA / UK /Australia / Canada or residence permit is required.

required.name: United Arab Emirates
required.note: Tourist visa can be obtained online through Emirates and Etihad airlines or authorized agents-DMCs

required.name: United Kingdom
required.note: Visa not required if holding a biometric Irish visa endorsed with "BC BIVS" and with a valid Irish entry stamp.

required.name: Vietnam
required.note: Visa may be obtained on arrival if prior Online approval has been obtained through a travel agency.

not-required.name: Nepal
not-required.note: Indian citizens may live and work freely in Nepal under the terms of the 1950 Indo-Nepal Treaty of Peace and Friendship.

evisa.name: Antigua and Barbuda
evisa.note:
Also visa on arrival if holding a valid visa or permanent resident card for the US or Canada.
Cruise ship visitors do not require a visa provided that they arrive in Antigua and Barbuda in the morning and depart the same evening.
In transit passengers traveling within the same day, do not need a visa for entry into Antigua and Barbuda, provided that they have proof of their onward journey.

evisa.name: Ivory Coast
evisa.note: 3 months; eVisa holders must arrive via Port Bouet Airport.

evisa.name: Gabon
evisa.note: Electronic visa holders must arrive via Libreville International Airport.

evisa.name: Georgia (country)
evisa.note: Multiple Visa upto 90 days. Visa not required for holders of valid visa or residence permit issued by USA, UK, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, Israel, South Korea, Schengen and GCC countries.

evisa.name: Myanmar
evisa.note:
28 days. eVisa holders must arrive via Yangon, Nay Pyi Taw or Mandalay airports.
Visa on arrival at Airports also available at USD 20/

evisa.name: Rwanda
evisa.note:
East African Tourist Visa will allow travel between Kenya, Rwanda and Tanzania

Visa Fees: 100 USD per visa
Validity of Visa: 90 days
Single of Multiple Entry: Multiple entry to all three countries

evisa.name: São Tomé and Príncipe
evisa.note: Holders of a visa issued by the United States or a Schengen area member state do not require a visa for stays up to 15 days.

evisa.name: Tajikistan
evisa.note: E-visa holders can enter through all border points.

on-arrival.name: Bolivia
on-arrival.note: 90 days, visa on arrival only at La Paz,Santa Cruz airport. Land entry requires prior Visa or Invitation which is free of cost.

on-arrival.name: Cambodia
on-arrival.note: 30 days. 35 USD to be paid in USD

on-arrival.name: Guyana
on-arrival.note: 30 days provided holding a letter of invitation from sponsor or host; and contact details of sponsor, host or hotel; and two passport photos.

on-arrival.name: Jordan
on-arrival.note: 2 weeks Single Entry Visa would cost JD 40 (Approx INR 3900), must holder confirmed return ticket and hotel booking as well as proof of money enough to cover the entire tour

on-arrival.name: Somalia
on-arrival.note:
30 days, provided an invitation letter issued by the sponsor has been submitted
to the Airport Immigration Department at least 2 days before arrival.

on-arrival.name: Suriname
on-arrival.note: 90 days; available at Johan Adolf Pengel International Airport.

on-arrival.name: Tanzania
on-arrival.note: The East Africa Tourist Visa will allow travel between Kenya, Rwanda and Uganda with the same multiple entry visa

on-arrival.name: Thailand
on-arrival.note: 15 days. Visa fee of 1000 Thai Baht needs to be paid in Thai currency. Visa on Arrival has to be obtained at First point of Entry/Landing not the Final Destination.

on-arrival.name: Uganda
on-arrival.note:
The East Africa Tourist Visa will allow travel between Kenya, Rwanda and Uganda with the same multiple entry visa.

Visa Fees: 100 USD per visa
Validity of Visa: 90 days
Single of Multiple Entry: Multiple entry to all three countries
